throughout our day with the stolten
brothers they told us off camera about
some of the challenges they'd face
throughout their lives to get to where
they are today including tom the current

autism so we sat down to hear more about
his and their shared immensely inspiring
journey were you always like a strong
kid growing up or did that come later in
your life um
